locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Chinese Word HD
locale.subtitle: Practice the stroke of Chinese
locale.description: Hundreds of thousands of children in the world are playing the game of Chinese characters in "baby paradise" series. The baby Chinese character garden HD (PAD version) is designed for the children to learn Chinese characters. The learning of Chinese characters can make the children clearly know the stroke, the direction and order of the strokes, and visualize the visual memory of the Chinese characters, and the pronunciation of Mandarin and Cantonese and the corresponding pronunciation of each Chinese character. Picture explanation is a good helper for children to learn Chinese characters. Let's download the experience quickly.
locale.promotional_text: Help children quickly master Chinese character strokes

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝汉字园HD-练字书写软件
locale.subtitle: 练习汉字笔划书写
locale.description: 全球几十万小朋友都在玩的《宝宝乐园》系列之学习汉字游戏，全新登场！ 宝宝汉字园HD(PAD版本)是专为小朋友学习汉字而设计的，通过汉字笔画的学习 能够令孩子清楚的知道汉字的落笔、笔划的方向及次序等，可视化地抄写中文增强对汉字的视觉记忆 ,并配有每个汉字的普通话和粤语读音以及相应的图片说明，是孩子们学习汉字的好帮手，赶快来下载体验吧！
locale.promotional_text: 帮助宝宝快速掌握汉字的笔画书写

keywords.keyword: 儿童, 早教, 小孩, 识字, 汉字, 学汉字, 文字, 拖拖乐, 拼图, 教育, 乐看, 动画, 书法, 笔画, 练字, 魔力小孩识字, 儿歌点点, 多多, 悟空识字, 睡前故事宝宝, 瓦贝儿歌, 宝宝孕育, 性爱姿势, 猪迪克识字, 魔卡幻想
